hypothesis_content.title: ETH Gas Futures Launch Impact on Layer-2 Tokens
hypothesis_content.statement: Following ETHGas's blockspace futures market launch announcement, Layer-2 ecosystem tokens (SKY, GRT) outperform ETH by +5% relative over 5 trading days as market prices in reduced gas volatility premium.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Gas futures allow hedging of blockspace costs, reducing operational uncertainty for L2 networks. This should increase L2 adoption expectations, benefiting native tokens. Similar effects observed after EIP-1559 implementation.
entry_conditions: ETHGas futures market announcement confirmed (news volume spike)
SKY or GRT shows positive volume increase >50% vs 7-day average
ETH gas fees are elevated (>50 gwei) at announcement time

exit_conditions.take_profit: +8% relative to ETH OR 5 trading days elapsed

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If L2 tokens underperform ETH during period OR if announcement coincides with broader market selloff (>3% BTC drop).
